name: Stefan
quote: I joined Give and Grow because the mission focuses on students who get overlooked by the system. I want to be part of work that actually impacts people's lives and make a difference for the greater good

name: Dorian
quote: I love it when I know my work can genuinely make a difference in the lives of others - that's why I'm so proud to be volunteering with Give and Grow.

name: Iolani
quote: I’m here because I genuinely enjoy seeing students win. If I can help even one kid feel smarter or more supported, that’s a win for me, too.
